Locale.Value:
Hello Friends,
Style Check is here! Version 1.4 brings the smash feature from Mac and iOS to Windows. You can access it under the Focus menu, just like Syntax highlighting.
In addition to Style Check, 1.4 includes the following:
- Added a new splash screen on start up
- Improved window borders
- Metadata variables are now case insensitive
- Fixed TOC links in Preview
- Fixed an issue where a space character would not overwrite a selection
